nodes.text: The Heavy Battle Droid is a variant of the B1-Series battle droid which is more heavily armored than the base model. They were armed with larger and more powerful blasters than the regular B1's E-5 blaster rifles, and wore larger "backpacks". It was used by the Trade Federation Droid Army during the time of the Invasion of Naboo.
The Heavy Battle Droid appears in the video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds.
